transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. You can ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚏 I stop at a special place to pick you up.
👧🏽 Lots of children ride me together.

transport.question: I go on the water and can take you to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: 🛳️ I am bigger than a boat

transport.question: I have two wheels and you need to pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🦽You need to balance to ride me.
⛑️ You should wear a helmet when riding me.
🚴 I am often ridden in the park.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can carry lots of people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🔊 I make a loud noise when I arrive.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to different countries. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am very big and white
✈️ I have wings and an engine.

transport.question: I am like a car, but I can take you anywhere, even off the road. People use me to climb mountains. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ I can drive over rough ground
🚧 You need to hold on tight

transport.question: I'm a type of boat that can go under the sea. What am I?
I am a car that can take you anywhere, but I need a special road. What am I?

hints.text: 🚡 I am high above the ground.
🚠I go to the top of a mountain.

transport.question: I am a motorcycle with three wheels, often used to carry things. What am I?

hints.text: 🚚 I am helpful for delivering things

transport.question: I fly very fast and can explore space. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I can travel to other planets

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, and I'm very far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and you live on me. What am I?
I am very hot and bright, and I give Earth light. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, and sometimes you can see me at night. What am I?
I am a group of stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Sometimes I look like an animal.
✨ You can find me by connecting the dots.
🌠 Some of them have names like 'The Big Dipper'.

cosmos.question: I am a very big group of stars, dust and gas. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I'm much bigger than a constellation.
🌌 The Milky Way is one of me!

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas that makes light. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌟 I'm like the sun, but there are billions of me!

cosmos.question: I am a ball of rock that travels around the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am a big object in space.

cosmos.question: I am a frozen ball of ice and dust with a tail that points away from the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I visit our Solar system every now and then.
🧊 I get brighter the closer I get to the sun.
✨ My tail is made of dust and gas.

cosmos.question: I am a group of planets that go around a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 Our system has one very bright star.
🪐 The planets are the main part of me.
